step.cmd: Toggle the results view in the concept panel using the view button .
step.stepresult:
At the bottom of the concept panel, the results of the classifier can be seen. There are 4 tabs, labelled Normal Forms, Differences, Equivalents and Logic.
The Normal Forms tab provides a concise representation of the relationships for the selected concept, expressed for each of the available forms. These forms are respectively:-
Stated form (SF)stated formSF
Inferred (I)inferredI
Distributed Normal Form (DN)distributed normal formDN
Authoring Normal Form (AN)authoring normal formAN
Short Canonical Form (SC)short canonical formSC
Long Canonical Form (LC)long canonical formLC
Normal Form Tab showing all relationships for a given concept as determined by the Classifier
